about_the_game:
This is a top-down survivor game developed using the Unreal Engine 5.
You are about to embark on a thrilling and exciting journey of intense battles, teamwork, and unique creativity, as well as an endless frenzy of survival games.





Players will play as a warrior, leveling up by killing enemies and learning various skills to eliminate more enemies.
In the game, you can choose different heroes to acquire basic skills and start the game.
In the game, there are over 200 skills and over 1000 attribute entries (still increasing) for you to match, form bonds, explore stronger combinations, and summon bombers to fight for you.
Evade enemy attacks, kill enemies, encounter bosses, arm yourself in upgrades,
With the support of Unreal Engine, it has excellent special effects and supports up to 10000 monsters on the same screen. Kill them to your heart's content.

name: YYDS Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I3 8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 1060
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 10400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space

short_description: yyds is a super cool high-speed action pigeon game. Multiple character choices, dozens of skills, different combinations have different skill effects, higher degrees of freedom, create different experiences, fight against zombie attacks, crazily output, experience fast-paced battles.
